title: Number of Starwood Hotels and Resorts hotels worldwide 2009 to 2015
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of hotels. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
In general Number of hotels has rose over the Year.
Number of hotels is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Number of hotels, about 1207.0 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Number of hotels, of value 942.0 was reported at Year 2009
